message.name: ERR_PARTICIPANTNOTE_SL_FV_SENSITIVITY
message.locale: You do not have access to this participant note.

message.name: ERR_PARTICIPANTNOTE_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_CREATE
message.locale: New notes cannot be added for a client that is currently marked as a duplicate.

message.name: ERR_PARTICIPANTNOTE_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_MODIFY
message.locale: Notes of a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_PARTICIPANTNOTE_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_DELETE
message.locale: Notes for a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be deleted.
